message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth, I'm proposing an initial price of $925,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, my budget allows me to only consider offers within the range of $700,000 to $800,000. I hope we can find common ground.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but my valuation for the product is significantly higher.  I'm willing to come down to $875,000.  This is a very competitive offer considering the value this product will bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price. However, I still need to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $800,000?
